Headline: Temporary Westbound #103 West 103rd  Reroute near 103rd/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Westbound 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted near 103rd/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Pulaski, 100th layover Brother Rice High School, Pulaski, 103rd, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 103rd/Pulaski.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/South Chicago
ShortDescription: Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Anthony, 86th and South Chicago due to street blockage near 87th/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Anthony, 86th and South Chicago due to street blockage near 87th/South Chicago.
